queue.name: Fix selectedModelMeta null on mount + default model ID mismatch in CreateProject
queue.description:
CreateProject's conditional UI (FEAT-24) is broken on mount. selectedModelMeta initializes to null (line 418) and ModelSelector's onChange only fires on user click, not on mount. So selectedModelMeta?.tier === 'subscription' at line 1298 is always false on initial render â€” shows 'Define Project with AI' button instead of checkbox, even when a subscription model is the default.

Additionally, the default model ID 'anthropic/claude-sonnet-4' (line 417) doesn't match any SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS ID. Those use 'claude-sonnet-4.5' format without the 'anthropic/' prefix. This also causes the trigger badge to show 'PAID' instead of 'PRO' because modelList.find() at ModelSelector line 371 can't find the model.

Fix: Export SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS from ModelSelector, import in CreateProject, derive isSubscriptionModel from the array (works without onChange click), fix default model ID to match SUBSCRIPTION_MODELS format.

Ref: Screenshot from production shows 'PAID' badge + 'Define Project with AI' button visible for Anthropic Claude Sonnet 4 with Claude Code Ready in dropdown.

queue.name: Remove claude --resume auto-start, show terminal hint instead
queue.description:
ClaudeCodeTerminalChat auto-sends 'claude --resume' on every WebSocket 'connected' event (line 273, no conditions). For new projects with no prior conversation, claude --resume shows 'No conversations to resume' and prompts Ctrl+C, which doesn't work from the chat input â€” user is stuck.

Anthropic changed --resume behavior: when there's nothing to resume, it hangs waiting for Ctrl+C. The auto-start approach is fundamentally broken.

Fix: Add autoStart prop (default false). When false, don't call startClaudeCode(). Instead write a cyan hint to the terminal telling user to type 'claude' or 'claude --resume'. Set claudeStartedRef.current=true and status='claude_ready' so the terminal accepts input. Keep startClaudeCode function available for future explicit use.

No changes needed to Chat.jsx or Workspace.jsx â€” they don't pass autoStart so it defaults to false.

Ref: startClaudeCode at lines 518-552, auto-call at line 273 in case 'connected', session tracking via localStorage claude_session_{slug}.

frontend/src/components/ClaudeCodeTerminalChat.jsx lines 267-273: Replace 'Starting Claude Code session...' writeln and startClaudeCode() call with conditional: if (autoStart !== false) { startClaudeCode() } else { write cyan hint: 'Type "claude" to start a new session, or "claude --resume" to resume a previous one.', set claudeStartedRef.current=true, setStatus('claude_ready') }

_templates._note: These templates are the REQUIRED format. Both Director and Engineer must follow them exactly.

new_task._when: Director creates this when writing a new task
new_task.name: Short descriptive name
new_task.description: Root cause analysis with file paths and line numbers from CODEBASE_INDEX.yaml. Include learnings session refs. Be specific.
change: file/path.ext line N: specific change description
file/path.ext line N: specific change description
new_task.test: Step-by-step: (1) do X, (2) expect Y. REQUIRED: specify what output to paste in completion_note as evidence.
new_task.investigation_id: INV-XX or null if no investigation was needed

engineer_signoff._filled_by: Lead Engineer when task is done
_rules: completion_note MUST be 30+ words with file paths and test evidence
All checklist items MUST be true
If task test field says 'paste X', you MUST paste X in completion_note
engineer_signoff.completion_note: Changed [files]. Fixed [what]. Test evidence: [paste actual output — sqlite3 results, curl responses, browser console, etc]. Affected areas: [what else might be impacted].

_rules: Check completion_note has test evidence (not just description)
Check status was set to pending_review (not done/completed)
Check CODEBASE_INDEX.yaml was updated: git log -3 -- harness/CODEBASE_INDEX.yaml
Check all checklist items are true
Spot-check one file's line count against index entry
REJECT if any check fails — set status back to pending with rejection_note
director_review.review_notes: Verified: [what was checked]. Index commit: [hash]. Test evidence confirmed: [what was verified].

completed_task._note: This is what goes in the 'completed' array. PRESERVE all fields — never strip down to just id/name/date.
completed_task.name: Short descriptive name
completed_task.completion_note: PRESERVED from engineer — never delete this

investigation_request._created_by: Director when Gate 1 fails (index missing or stale)
investigation_request._handed_to: Code Researcher agent via: 'Investigate the request at harness/investigations/active/INV-XX.md'
investigation_request._flow: Director fills request → spawns Code Researcher → agent reads request, scans code, writes to index, saves report → Director reads report → Director writes task
